channel.title: Char screen
channel.description:
Need 2 codes for project16 source. 1 Code is when you log in for the first time, it shows the character change screen. then when they change it thats there character look.
Other code is the command ::char. that makes the screen go up.
I just was wondering if anyone would be so kind to give me the code or a TUT.
Thanks, sitebanis :D :D :D

item.title: Char screen
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!

Find the login thingy. With the messages it sends when you log in.

where do I put the first one?

item.title: Char screen
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

Around if(GetLastLogin(mutedate) >= 2) muted = 0; else muted = 1; if(playerRights >= 0) { sendMessage("Welcome to Shatt3rscape!"); sendMessage("No range pking--DONT ASK FOR RANGE STUFF!"); sendMessage("Don't mass pk."); }
Or something like that, under the sendMessages, add
showInterface(3559);

else if(command.startsWith("char") && playerRights <= 5) { showInterface(3559); }

Read full topic
